@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package io.libraft.algorithm

Implementation classes for the Raft distributed consensus algorithm.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Log LogEntry storage service.
RPCReceiver Incoming Raft RPC message notification service.
RPCSender Raft RPC message sending service.
Store Metadata storage service that stores metadata required by a Raft server to participate in a Raft cluster.
Timer Timer service used by RaftAlgorithm to schedule one-time tasks for future execution at a specified timeout.
Timer.TimeoutHandle Opaque handle bound to an instance of Timer.TimeoutTask that can be used to control and/or query the status of that task.
Timer.TimeoutTask A task that should be run by a Timer at a future timeout.
 

Class Summary
LogEntry An entry in the Raft replicated log.
LogEntry.ClientEntry LogEntry that contains a client Command.
LogEntry.ConfigurationEntry LogEntry that contains the configuration state of the Raft cluster.
LogEntry.NoopEntry noop LogEntry.
RaftAlgorithm Raft distributed consensus algorithm.
RaftConstants Default constants used in RaftAlgorithm.
 

Enum Summary
LogEntry.Type The four allowed LogEntry types.
 

Exception Summary
RPCException Wraps implementation-specific exceptions thrown by a RPCSender.
StorageException Wraps implementation-specific exceptions thrown by a Store or Log.
 

Error Summary
RaftError Thrown when RaftAlgorithm encounters an unrecoverable error.
 

Package io.libraft.algorithm Description

Implementation classes for the Raft distributed consensus algorithm.

Contains:

  • io.libraft.RaftAlgorithm: implementation of the Raft algorithm.
  • Service interfaces that used by RaftAlgorithm (for example, packet-sending, persistence, etc.). No implementations are provided.
